text_block_list.text: On that day as well, Symboli Kris S' 『Trainer Selection』 was continuing as planned, but――

text_block_list.name: Mid-Rank Trainer A
text_block_list.text: 『Yeah, some work came up suddenly. So, if you wanted to watch, there won't be anything today』

text_block_list.name: Mid-Rank Trainer A
text_block_list.text: [……Well, I've kinda lost confidence in being able to work with her though…… anyways, just letting you know!]
He had already let Symboli Kris S know but…… I was kind of worried, so I went to see her.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――I was planning…… on training―― myself anyways. ――So, no problem.
choice_data_list: If you'd like, I could help

text_block_list.text: If things stayed like this, I was worried that Symboli Kris S would become isolated. I wondered if there was any way I could help her――
And so, I was going to supervise Symboli Kris S' training for just the day, but――

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――Next, lunges. ――Any objections?
Symboli Kris S seemed to have designed the training menu to not cross a line that would put too much strain on her body.
Because of this line―― she wasn't able to follow the menu that the trainers provided her.
It wasn't that she wanted to slack off or had reached her limit. It was probably because she wanted to avoid overworking herself at all costs.
choice_data_list: Why are you regulating this so strictly?

text_block_list.text: There was a long silence, but I knew she was just searching for the right words. So―― I waited.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――――Back when…… I was in…… America.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: (――My body was weak. And, more than now…… I was bad at speaking)

text_block_list.name: Hometown Coach
text_block_list.text: Oh, are you okay? Are you tired?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: (I wanted to run more―― if I rest, I can run more. Even though I thought that, I couldn't say it)

text_block_list.name: Hometown Coach
text_block_list.text: Kris S-san, you tire easily don't you? It's fine, why don't we call it a day?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: (Because of that, I couldn't get better at running. For no other reason than I couldn't say it)

text_block_list.name: Kris S' Mentor
text_block_list.text: ――Pardon me. I'm from the Symboli family in Japan…… that girl, would it be alright if I took a look at her?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――My mentor…… for the sake of raising the level of racing in Japan―― He came to scout…… promising Uma Musume, he said.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: In my case―― I probably…… wasn't promising. But, he taught me ――Lots of things.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: Even with a weak body―― training, was possible. ――If there were results, people would come―― to evaluate them, he said.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: (To prevent strain on my body, training was strictly managed. Break time, meal time, play time too.)

text_block_list.name: Kris S' Mentor
text_block_list.text: Yeah, you're working hard, huh. If you keep it up…… even if it's a little at a time, your physique will improve.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: (I eventually asked him, why are you letting me work hard…… even if I'm not saying I want to run, why are you having me run?)

text_block_list.name: Kris S' Mentor
text_block_list.text: ……Because, even though the training is strict, you continue on. Your results say more than hearing the 『Reasons』 of someone who's done nothing.

text_block_list.name: Kris S' Mentor
text_block_list.text: If you can't speak, then that's fine. Say it with your results.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――That's fine, he said. That's why―― I started to think it's fine.
choice_data_list: He accepted you as you were
He accepted you as you were

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ……That's why, when my mentor―― said he would return to his country. I was able―― to finally say…… that I didn't want him to go.

text_block_list.name: Kris S' Mentor
text_block_list.text: Sorry. I know you don't want me to leave―― But, if I stop here, I won't be able to fulfill my mission.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: (I asked what that mission was. What mission is it that my mentor would prioritize so much?)

text_block_list.name: Kris S' Mentor
text_block_list.text: Kris S, my mission…… is to revolutionize Japan's racing world.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: (His eyes were bright, and straight-forward)

text_block_list.name: Kris S' Mentor
text_block_list.text: As they are now, Japan's Uma Musume can't compete with the world. But, I will change that. Starting with what they call common sense.

text_block_list.name: Kris S' Mentor
text_block_list.text: For that reason…… I'm inviting World level Uma Musume from all over the world. That was my main motive.

text_block_list.name: Kris S' Mentor
text_block_list.text: That's right―― It's not what I had originally planned but, I plan on mentioning you too.

text_block_list.name: Kris S' Mentor
text_block_list.text: ――An Uma Musume like you, will revolutionize the racing world in Japan. One day, I believe that will happen.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――I will―

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: -become my mentor's results―― that's what I think.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: For that reason―― I continued to train. ――After I kept getting results…… Rudolf appeared.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: After hearing about me from my mentor―― she had always been watching. ――To change Japan, she wanted me to run…… and invited me.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――Together with that gratitude―― all of it, for those 『Results』. To be unbreakable, strong, building up a strong body――

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: In this country, Japan―― to become an Uma Musume that could cause a revolution. ――That's my mission.
『Changing the racing world in Japan』 ――An arduous, fantastical mission like that, she's saying she'll definitely fulfill it.
That's why she must have worked so hard to not strain her body in this important time before her debut.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――I'm the one ……that's grateful.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――You came here ――watched and listened. I still haven't―― shown you any results. ……That's why.
But was that true? Symboli Kris S seemed so focused on returning that gratitude, almost to the point of neglecting everything else.
After all, she was standing here because she had persevered through everything. The truth is――

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――Is that so? …………Results――huh.
Dignified but expressionless, certainly, it was hard to guess what she was thinking. However――
If you face her with sincerity, she will return it. Hidden behind that veil was genuineness.
choice_data_list: (I want to see eye to eye with her)

text_block_list.text: If I'm lacking, then I want to change that. I had a strong desire to become a trainer that could support her.
